HOME

I'm making a daily activity sheet.

Jan 1, 2017

To start 2017, my brother, Osebo and I decided to make activity sheets to push ourselves to create new stuff everyday.

I'll use this space to document the things I'm working on, share my ideas and record my journey.

Today I upgraded to a new '15 macbook 🙌🏼 . It's nice to start a new year with fresh hardware that will allow me to continue to improve my programming and design.

One of the things I'm looking forward to most in 2017 is building Stash. Osebo, Diego and I have been working hard and will be relasing an MVP soon. Off to the races.
